backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing ports and tugboats with CRUD-like functions and auto-incrementing IDs, including helpers for geo points and warehouses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend files, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with custom CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, query client provider, theme provider, and role provider for the app.
frontend/src/components/common/DetailDra: Reusable sheet-based drawer component for displaying entity details in a side panel.
frontend/src/components/common/KpiCard.t: KPI card component showing metric values, icons, and optional trend indicators with variant styling.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error state, and empty state components for data-fetching views.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusBad: Badge component that normalizes a status string and renders a color-coded variant based on type.
frontend/src/components/common/VesselFin: Embeds a VesselFinder AIS map by injecting config and script tags once into a container div.
Defines the main app layout with header, side navigation, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Renders the top navigation bar showing logo, alert count, and a role selector that triggers navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Generates a role‑based side navigation menu with icons and active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/data/temaFleet.ts: Provides static structured data describing the Tema port tugboat fleet and vessel specifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom harbor‑themed color system with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/assignments/Assignmen: Displays a dialog for updating an assignment's status using a controlled select and mutation hook.
Displays a list of assignments with vessel, berth, tugboat, and status details, and provides create/edit dialog functionality.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthDetailP: Shows detailed information for a selected berth inside a drawer, including identification, location, specifications, and operational notes.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthingPage: Fetches and displays Port of Tema data, rendering a grouped infrastructure view or appropriate loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/berthViewerM: Defines types and helpers for augmenting berths with size, occupancy, and mock schedule data, plus filtering utilities.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/Infrastructu: Renders grouped infrastructure sections with cards showing berth and facility details for different port categories.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/PortOfTemaOv: Displays port metadata, infrastructure KPIs, and a table of dry docking stations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/BerthMaste: Displays berth utilization, occupancy, and vessel assignments, with tables listing berth specs and current status. Includes KPI cards and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Maintenanc: Shows tugboat health metrics derived from engine power, with KPIs and a detailed equipment health table. Computes operational status and utilization for each tug.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PortOpsDas: Provides port‑wide KPIs, recent vessel arrivals, active assignments, and urgent alerts. Integrates tables and AIS map components for operational visibility.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TugDispatc: Manages tugboat availability and assignments, showing fleet status and active jobs. Displays KPIs and tables of tug status and assignment queues.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatHealt: Detail drawer showing calculated health metrics for a tugboat, including engine, hydraulic, and utilization scores. Uses progress bars and cards to present system health.
Displays a fleet header and grid of tugboat cards with key details and specifications.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/tugboatListT: Defines TypeScript interfaces for tugboat specifications, tugboat data, and fleet metadata.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatsPage: Renders the tugboat fleet page and injects static Tema fleet data into TugboatList.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselDetailP: Shows detailed vessel info, berth assignment, and assigned tugboats inside a drawer panel.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselsPage.t: Lists vessels with search, table view, and a panel for viewing vessel details.
frontend/src/services/backendClient.ts: Defines query keys and exposes a hook to access the backend actor.
frontend/src/services/mutations.ts: Provides a legacy mutation hook for updating assignment status that now always errors.
frontend/src/services/queries.ts: Implements frontend data queries, with most returning empty arrays except those using the backend actor.
frontend/src/state/role.ts: Defines role types and configurations including navigation and descriptions.
frontend/src/state/RoleProvider.tsx: Provides role-based context with persistence and access hooks.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Contains legacy stub types for vessels, berths, tugboats, assignments, and alerts.
frontend/src/types/temaPort.ts: Defines structured types for Port of Tema metadata, berths, docks, and grouped infrastructure.
frontend/src/utils/berthSpecs.ts: Helpers for detecting unspecified berth dimension values, formatting them, and checking vessel‑berth compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, features, and requirements for creating and integrating a reusable TugboatList component fed by Tema fleet JSON.
